name: lens-studio
description: An agentic AI system that help you build, debug, and generate Lenses for Snapchat and Spectacles
long_description:
**Important: Launch Lens Studio 5.15 or later before installing this extension. The extension requires an active Lens Studio session to connect properly.**

---

The Lens Studio AI extension brings intelligent AR development assistance directly into your workflow. This agentic AI system lets you build, debug, and generate Lenses through natural language interactions.

**Key Features:**
- Build complete Lenses from text descriptions
- Manipulate scene objects, components, and assets conversationally
- Generate 3D models, textures, and face masks with GenAI
- Debug and analyze your Lens with AI-powered insights
- Search and install packages, music, and assets from libraries
- Query Lens Studio's knowledge base for help and best practices

Learn more about [how the system works](https://developers.snap.com/lens-studio/features/lens-studio-ai/overview).

**Setup and Usage:** Make sure you have Lens Studio open. When you first use the extension, accept the authentication permission prompt. You won't need to do this again in subsequent sessions.

tools.name: Set Lens Studio Property
tools.description: Sets the value of a property on a scene object, component, or asset in Lens Studio by object ID.

tools.name: Install Lens Studio Package
tools.description: Installs a package from a URI. Can be used on any URI, both local and remote; Important: use this to import/install assets from the Asset Library Note: Some packages are automatically instantiated in the scene after installation. Use scene introspection before attempting instantiation to avoid duplicates.

tools.name: Generate Texture
tools.description: Generates general-purpose textures using Snap's Aether Stable Diffusion text-to-image server. Creates PBR textures, tileable patterns, materials, and photorealistic textures based on text prompts.

prompts.name: generate_panda_face_mask
prompts.text: Generate a panda face mask texture
